MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Bryn Glas Close and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.30PM due to a faulty cable. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.48PM on 29th December 2020.
